description:
Travelling with the music group, he is looking to take revenge on the one who `took everything from him` two years prior. This man also happened to carve his heart out, yet Keno refused to die. Kokonoe, the demon princess, was very fond of that behaviour, so she brought him back and since then is travelling with him.
Due to his extreme beautiful looks he gets mistaken for a woman more than just once.
He`s the holder of the Wisdom bead.
name: Inusaka Keno
